title: BCR: Peru's private investment up 11.4 % in 3Q 2025
MEF: Public and private investment dynamism drives decent employment growth in Peru
description:
?? El dinamismo de la inversión pública y privada impulsa el empleo.

Entre octubre de 2024 y septiembre de 2025, el empleo adecuado creció 6,8 % y permitió que más de 610 000 personas accedieran a mejores condiciones laborales. Además, en el tercer trimestre de 2025, el empleo… pic.twitter.com/Fs7I...

title: Peru studying India's demand for separate chapter on critical minerals in FTA: Envoy
description: India wants a separate chapter on critical minerals in the under negotiation Free Trade Agreement (FTA) with Peru, Peruvian Ambassador Javier Manuel Paulinich Velarde told ANI on Wednesday, adding that Lima is studying the proposal. title: Peru: Economy up 3.9% in Sept 2025, marking 21 consecutive months of expansion
description:
00:15 | Lima, Nov. 17.

The sector reported that Gross Domestic Product (GDP) recorded a 3.3% increase between January and September, consolidating the economic recovery process.
